Title: Donate to Charity
Description: Donate money to a charity to help kids in need get proper STEM education. This will help you have a better reputation with the public, and increase your reputation by 3

Title: Collect Data from Users
Description: Get a $5M cash boost from selling users data to third party companies, This will also greatly increase the risk of a scandal.

Title: Increase Funding to Cyber-Security
Description: Reduce chance of a cyber attack in the future by 25%
